news.title: ‘Climate of fear’: ICE violence in Minnesota forces CEOs to weigh the risks of speaking out against Trump
news.summary: Minneapolis has become a testing ground for when and how far corporate leaders will wade into escalating political tensions. Minneapolis has become theTesting Ground for When and How far Corporate leaders Will wade in.

news.title: Oil prices rise more than 2% as Trump weighs strikes on Iran
news.summary: Multiple sources told Reuters that Trump is weighing targeted strikes on Iranian security forces and leaders. Trump is believed to be considering strikes to inspire protestors.

news.title: Government shutdown: Republicans consider escape hatch as Congress careens toward deadline
news.summary: The U.S. government is poised to shut down early Saturday morning unless Congress approves spending measures. Much of the U.N. Security Council is expected to vote on a resolution to keep the government open.

news.title: Meta's Mark Zuckerberg gets green light from Wall Street to keep pouring money into AI
news.summary: Meta's stock pop following the company's latest earnings beat is a sign that investors are OK with hefty AI spending as long as the core business stays strong.

news.title: Comcast posts mixed quarter as broadband pressures weigh on business
news.summary: Comcast’s broadband business continues to be under pressure due to the rise of competitors, particularly in the 5G space. The company is expected to make a profit for the first time since 2010.

news.title: Central banks have actually slowed their purchases of gold, but investors have more than made up the difference
news.summary: Total demand for gold smashed records last year, the World Gold Council said. But central-bank interest has a strong rival, the council said.

news.title: Gold’s soaring so fast it’s topped Goldman target set only last week. Now a JPMorgan analyst plots path to $8,500.
news.summary: A JPMorgan strategist calculates impact on gold prices were households to swap out bonds for the yelllow metal in balanced portfolios. A JPMorgan Strategist calculates impact of gold prices on households.

news.title: Surprisingly strong software growth sends IBM’s stock surging
news.summary: IBM shares surged in early trade on Thursday. Surprisingly strong software growth sent IBM shares surging. IBM shares surged more than 7% in early trading.

news.title: Here’s what 2026 could look like for Levi’s: more dresses, less denim and an AI ‘stylist’
news.summary: Levi’s sees sales of tops, dresses and non-denim bottoms growing fast. Levi's: Sales of tops and dresses are on the rise. Sales of bottoms are down, but sales of pants are up.

news.title: Data-center demand helps Caterpillar to best quarter ever — but there’s a tariff sting
news.summary: Caterpillar’s backlog increased by 71% from a year ago, reaching a record for the construction-machinery maker.
